message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product that I think you'll really value. I'm asking for $95 for it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer but I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my original asking price. How about $90?  It's a good price for both of us.
I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $90. Can you meet me at $87? That's the highest I'm willing to go.
